BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE NATIONAL SOCIETY OF COLONIAL DAMES
BusinessName.BusinessNameLine2Txt: OF AMERICA IN THE COMMONWEALTH OF KY

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: COLLECT AND PRESERVE MANUSCRIPTS, TRADITIONS, RELICS AND MEMENTOS OF BYGONE DAYS; TO PRESERVE AND RESTORE BUILDINGS CONNECTED WITH THE EARLY HISTORY OF OUR COUNTRY; TO EDUCATE FELLOW CITIZENS AND OURSELVES IN OUR COUNTRY'S HISTORY AND THUS DIFFURE HELPFUL AND INTELLIGENT INFORMATION CONCERNING THE PAST, TO CREATE AN INTEREST IN OUR COLONIAL HISTORY, AND STIMULATE A SPIRIT OF TRUE PATRIOTISM AND GENUINE LOVE OF COUNTRY AND TO IMPRESS UPON YOUNG THE SACRED OBLIGATION OF HONORING THE MEMORY OF THOSE HERIOC ANCESTORS WHOSE ABILITY, VALOR, SUFFERINGS AND ACHIEVEMENTS ARE BEYOND ALL PRAISE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: COLLECT AND PRESERVE MANUSCRIPTS, TRADITIONS, RELICS AND MEMENTOS OF BYGONE DAYS; TO PRESERVE AND RESTORE BUILDINGS CONNECTED WITH THE EARLY HISTORY OF OUR COUNTRY; TO EDUCATE FELLOW CITIZENS AND OURSELVES IN OUR COUNTRY'S HISTORY AND THUS DIFFURE HELPFUL AND INTELLIGENT INFORMATION CONCERNING THE PAST, TO CREATE AN INTEREST IN OUR COLONIAL HISTORY, AND STIMULATE A SPIRIT OF TRUE PATRIOTISM AND GENUINE LOVE OF COUNTRY AND TO IMPRESS UPON YOUNG THE SACRED OBLIGATION OF HONORING THE MEMORY OF THOSE HERIOC ANCESTORS WHOSE ABILITY, VALOR, SUFFERINGS AND ACHIEVEMENTS ARE BEYOND ALL PRAISE.
IRS990.Desc: MUSEUM CURATORIAL COMPONENTS RELATED TO TWO 19TH CENTRURY MUSEUM HOUSES

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: MAINTENANCE OF THE LIBERTY HALL AND ORLANDO BROWN HISTORIC HOMES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: THE SOCIETY SUPPORTS VARIOUS PATRIOTIC PROGRAMS AND MEMBERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL SOCIETY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part III, Line 1a: If organization elected under SFAS 116 to not report are, historical treasures, o
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization's homes and related furnishings are considered collections. The Organization has adopted a policy of not capitalizing these same collections in its financial statements. Nevertheless, they are historic treasurers and are the Organization's most significant assets.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOCIETY HAS DUES PAYING MEMBERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL MEMBERS ELECT BOARD AND OFFICERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY ARE SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: No review was or will be conducted.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL BOARD MEMBERS AND OFFICERS HAVE SIGNED THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICYAND ANNUALLY REPORT ANY CONFLICT OF INTEREST TO THE BOARD FOR REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS DISCLOSURE EXPLANATION DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AT IT'S OFFICE IN FRANKFORT.
